title.rendered: “IDF and Border Police Demolish Homes of Hamas Terrorists: Key Highlights and Exclusive Footage”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF and Border Police demolished last night the homes of two Hamas terrorists who carried out the attack at the Tunnels Checkpoint on 16.11.

Reserve IDF soldiers, engineering troops, and Border Police demolished last night in the city of Hebron in the Judea Division the homes of two terrorists active in the Hamas terror organization, who carried out, together with another terrorist, the attack at the Tunnels Checkpoint on 16.11.2023, in which IDF soldier, Sgt. Major Abraham Patna fell.

IDF soldiers, the Shin Bet, and Border Police operated last night to arrest seven wanted individuals across Judea and Samaria. In the city of Nablus in the Samaria Division, the forces arrested two wanted individuals and seized weapons. In the village of Hizma in the Binyamin Division, the forces located and seized weapons including a Carlo-type weapon, gun parts, and ammunition.

Attached is footage of the terrorists’ homes demolition: https://bit.ly/3HytAHX

Attached are pictures from the demolition of the terrorists’ homes: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC21012024ERIGBFUYB
